attributes.action: Tony Blair to run vaccine rollout for the good of the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Tony Blair has the intellect and understanding required to accelerate and successfully deliver Covid vaccine rollout. Parliament has a duty to protect it's citizens and should appoint the most capable person to ensure that aim.
attributes.background: Avoiding partisan principles, appoint Tony Blair to lead the vaccine rollout on behalf of the nation.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes requests for particular individuals to be put in charge of specific programmes.
